PromptBody: Implement an AutoHotkey v2 class that monitors a directory for file changes and triggers callbacks when files are created, modified, or deleted.

Code:
ToggleHotkey(hotkeyString, showToolTip := true) {
    static hotkeyStates := Map()
    
    ; Initialize if first time
    if !hotkeyStates.Has(hotkeyString)
        hotkeyStates[hotkeyString] := true
    
    ; Toggle the state
    currentState := hotkeyStates[hotkeyString]
    newState := !currentState
    hotkeyStates[hotkeyString] := newState
    
    ; Enable or disable the hotkey
    if newState
        Hotkey hotkeyString, "On"
    else
        Hotkey hotkeyString, "Off"
    
    ; Show tooltip if requested
    if showToolTip {
        stateText := newState ? "Enabled" : "Disabled"
        ToolTip("Hotkey " hotkeyString " " stateText)
        SetTimer () => ToolTip(), -1000  ; Clear after 1 second
    }
    
    return newState
}
Errors: Error: A parameter is missing its comma or a block is missing its opening brace.
Notes: The error is due to missing commas after the hotkeyString parameter in the Hotkey command. Good use of Maps for state management.
PromptBody: Write a function in AutoHotkey v2 that can toggle any hotkey on and off and display a brief tooltip when the state changes.
